code: import{useState,useContext,useRef,useEffect}from'react';import Popup from'./Popup';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function EditAvatar(_ref){let{isOpen,onClose,onUpdateAvatar}=_ref;const link=useRef("");useEffect(()=>{if(!isOpen){link.current.value="";}},[isOpen]);const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();return onUpdateAvatar({avatar:link.current.value});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Popup,{isOpen:isOpen,onClose:onClose,onSubmit:handleSubmit,name:"avatar",title:"Alterar Foto de Perfil",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{ref:link,className:"popup__avatar-input",id:"avatar",placeholder:"Link da Imagem",type:"url",name:"image",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{id:"url-input-error",className:"popup__avatar-input_type_error"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"popup__avatar-submit",children:"Salvar"})]});}
